output.mean_keff: grep -E '(FAIBLE|LOWEST) SIGMA' *.listing | head -1 | awk '{for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i ~ /^[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$/ && $(i+1) ~ /^\+\/\-$/) {print $i; exit}}'
output.sigma_keff: grep -E '(FAIBLE|LOWEST) SIGMA' *.listing | head -1 | awk '{for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i ~ /^\+\/\-$/ && $(i+1) ~ /^[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$/) {print $(i+1); exit}}'
output.dkeff_pertu: if grep -q 'PERTU' *.m5 2>/dev/null; then grep -E '(FAIBLE|LOWEST) SIGMA' *.listing | sed -n '2p' | awk '{for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i ~ /^[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$/ && $(i+1) ~ /^\+\/\-$/) {print $i; exit}}'; fi
output.sigma_dkeff_pertu: if grep -q 'PERTU' *.m5 2>/dev/null; then grep -E '(FAIBLE|LOWEST) SIGMA' *.listing | sed -n '2p' | awk '{for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i ~ /^\+\/\-$/ && $(i+1) ~ /^[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$/) {print $(i+1); exit}}'; fi
